question: Statement - I: Reduction of ester by DIBAL-H followed by hydrolysis gives aldehyde.
Statement - II: Oxidation of benzyl alcohol with aqueous <katex>$\text{KMnO}_4$</katex> leads to the formation of Benzaldehyde.
Among the above statements, identify the correct statement.
choices: Both statements - I and II are false
Statement - I is true but statement - II is false
Statement - I is false but statement - II is true
Both statements - I and II are true
explanation: Statement I is True: DIBAL-H reduces esters to aldehydes.
Statement II is False: Strong oxidizing agents like <katex>$\text{KMnO}_4$</katex> oxidize benzyl alcohol directly to Benzoic acid, not Benzaldehyde.
